article_title: Gov. Brian Sandoval (R-NV) Delivers Weekly GOP Address On Jobs & The Economy
article_text:
Published on Sep 21, 2013

In the Weekly Republican Address, Nevada Governor Brian Sandoval says it's no accident that the fastest growing states with the best economies are all led by Republican governors. "When we reduce government, balance budgets, and keep taxes as low as possible, states respond in a positive way," Sandoval says. "When tough times force tough choices, we act decisively and move forward."
